div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Specimen|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Specimen` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Specimen`. Element `Specimen` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen`.
Element `Specimen.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.meta`.
Element `Specimen.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.implicitRules`.
Element `Specimen.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.language`.
Element `Specimen.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.text`.
Element `Specimen.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.contained`.
Element `Specimen.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.identifier`.
Element `Specimen.accessionIdentifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.accessionIdentifier`.
Element `Specimen.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.status`.
Element `Specimen.type` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.type`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Specimen.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Specimen.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.subject`.
Element `Specimen.receivedTime` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.receivedTime`.
Element `Specimen.parent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.parent`.
Element `Specimen.request` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.request`.
Element `Specimen.combined` is will have a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.
Element `Specimen.role` is will have a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.
Element `Specimen.feature` is will have a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.

Element `Specimen.feature.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Specimen.feature` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Specimen.feature.type` is will have a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.

Element `Specimen.feature.description` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Specimen.feature` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Specimen.feature.description` is will have a context of Specimen based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.
Element `Specimen.collection` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.collection`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Specimen.collection.collector` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Specimen.collection.collector` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.collection.collector`.

Note that the target element context `Specimen.collection.collected[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Specimen.collection`. Element `Specimen.collection.collected[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.collection.collected[x]`. Note that the target element context `Specimen.collection.collected[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Specimen.collection`.
Element `Specimen.collection.duration` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.collection.duration`.
Element `Specimen.collection.quantity` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.collection.quantity`.
Element `Specimen.collection.method` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.collection.method`.
Element `Specimen.collection.device` is will have a context of Specimen.collection based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Specimen.collection.procedure` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Specimen.collection.procedure` is will have a context of Specimen.collection based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.
Element `Specimen.collection.bodySite` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.collection.bodySite`.

Note that the target element context `Specimen.collection.fastingStatus[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Specimen.collection`. Element `Specimen.collection.fastingStatus[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.collection.fastingStatus[x]`. Note that the target element context `Specimen.collection.fastingStatus[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Specimen.collection`.
Element `Specimen.processing` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.processing`.
Element `Specimen.processing.description` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.processing.description`.
Element `Specimen.processing.method` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.processing.procedure`.
Element `Specimen.processing.additive` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.processing.additive`.

Note that the target element context `Specimen.processing.time[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Specimen.processing`. Element `Specimen.processing.time[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.processing.time[x]`. Note that the target element context `Specimen.processing.time[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Specimen.processing`.
Element `Specimen.container` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.container`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Specimen.container.device` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Specimen.container.device` is will have a context of Specimen.container based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Specimen.container.location` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Specimen.container.location` is will have a context of Specimen.container based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Specimen`.
Element `Specimen.container.specimenQuantity` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.container.specimenQuantity`.
Element `Specimen.condition` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.condition`.
Element `Specimen.note` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Specimen.note`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
